question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. TV
B. stairs
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The TV and stairs are both in the mid-to-background of the room, and their depth relationship is not obvious from the 2D image without a depth map or additional context.
